name: AllDungeons! 32 Bits
description:
Finally, our first official project "All Dungeons" is available for PC.
All Dungeons is a game where you will have to go through millions of dungeons slaying monsters  and beating various objectives. You can also challenge your friends to see who can get the most score in one map.

In  the near future, updating weaponry will be possible, as well as powerups to strength up your character momentarily

Minimal requirements:

Pentium 3 1GHz or better
Graphics card compatible with DirectX 9 or OpenGL 2.0 with 64mb VRAM
512MB RAM
30MB of hard disk space
Monitor capable of 640x480 or at minimum 320x240
